Name: Huckleberry (PH)
Description: This berry is a delicious alpine treat. They only grow in certain regions in the right soil, so they're near impossible to cultivate, highly prized, and expensive.

DescriptionLocalization.es: This berry is a delicious alpine treat. They only grow in certain regions in the right soil, so they're near impossible to cultivate, highly prized, and expensive.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: This berry is a delicious alpine treat. They only grow in certain regions in the right soil, so they're near impossible to cultivate, highly prized, and expensive.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Diese Beere ist ein köstlicher Alpengenuss. Sie wachsen nur in bestimmten Regionen auf dem richtigen Boden, daher sind sie nahezu unmöglich zu kultivieren, hoch geschätzt und teuer.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: This berry is a delicious alpine treat. They only grow in certain regions in the right soil, so they're near impossible to cultivate, highly prized, and expensive.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: This berry is a delicious alpine treat. They only grow in certain regions in the right soil, so they're near impossible to cultivate, highly prized, and expensive.

DescriptionLocalization.pt: This berry is a delicious alpine treat. They only grow in certain regions in the right soil, so they're near impossible to cultivate, highly prized, and expensive.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Данный сорт черники растет только в определенных регионах и в подходящей почве, поэтому вырастить ее в домашних условиях практически невозможно. В связи с этим высоко ценится. А ещё она очень вкусная!
DescriptionLocalization.tr: This berry is a delicious alpine treat. They only grow in certain regions in the right soil, so they're near impossible to cultivate, highly prized, and expensive.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 这种浆果是一种美味的高山美食。 它们只生长在某些地区的合适土壤中，因此它们几乎不可能种植、非常珍贵且价格昂贵。
